Name: Passerby of Wandering Cloud
4-Piece Bonus: At the beginning of the battle, immediately recovers 1 Skill Point.

Name: Musketeer of Wild Wheat
4-Piece Bonus: The wearer's SPD increases by 6% and Basic ATK DMG increases by 10%.

Name: Knight of Purity Palace
4-Piece Bonus: Increases the max DMG that can be absorbed by the shield created by the wearer by 20%.

Name: Hunter of Glacial Forest
4-Piece Bonus: After the wearer unleashes their Ultimate, their CRIT DMG increases by 25% for 2 turn(s).

Name: Champion of Streetwise Boxing
4-Piece Bonus: After the wearer attacks or is hit, their ATK increases by 5% for the rest of the battle. This effect can stack up to 5 time(s).

Name: Guard of Wuthering Snow
4-Piece Bonus: At the beginning of the turn, if the wearer's HP is equal to or less than 50% of their Max HP, restores HP equal to 8% of their Max HP and regenerates 5 Energy.

Name: Firesmith of Lava-Forging
4-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's Skill DMG by 12%. After unleashing Ultimate, increases the wearer's Fire DMG by 12% for next attack.

Name: Genius of Brilliant Stars
4-Piece Bonus: When the wearer deals DMG to the target enemy, ignores 10% DEF. If the target enemy has Quantum Weakness, the wearer additionally ignores 10% DEF.

Name: Band of Sizzling Thunder
4-Piece Bonus: When the wearer uses Skill, increases the wearer's ATK by 20% for 1 turn(s).

Name: Eagle of Twilight Line
4-Piece Bonus: After the wearer uses Ultimate, their action is Advanced Forward by 25%.

Name: Thief of Shooting Meteor
4-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 16%. When the wearer inflicts Weakness Break on an enemy, regenerates 3 Energy.

Name: Wastelander of Banditry Desert
4-Piece Bonus: When attacking debuffed enemies, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 10%, and their CRIT DMG increases by 20% against Imprisoned enemies.

Name: Longevous Disciple
4-Piece Bonus: When the wearer is hit or has their HP consumed by an ally or themselves, their CRIT Rate increases by 8% for 2 turn(s) and up to 2 stacks.

Name: Messenger Traversing Hackerspace
4-Piece Bonus: When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, SPD for all allies increases by 12% for 1 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.

Name: The Ashblazing Grand Duke
4-Piece Bonus: When the wearer uses follow-up attacks against the target enemy, increase the wearer's ATK by 6% for every time the follow-up attack deals DMG. This effect can stack for a maximum of 8 times and lasts for 3 turns. This effect is removed the next time the wearer uses a follow-up attack.

Name: Prisoner in Deep Confinement
4-Piece Bonus: For every DoT the target enemy is afflicted with, the wearer will ignore 6% of target's DEF when dealing DMG to them. This effect is valid for a max of 3 DoTs.

Name: Pioneer Diver of Dead Waters
2-Piece Bonus: Increases DMG dealt to enemies with debuff by 12%.
4-Piece Bonus: Increases CRIT Rate by 4%. The wearer deals 8%/12% increased CRIT DMG to enemies with at least 2/3 debuffs. After the wearer inflicts a debuff on enemy targets, the aforementioned effects increase by 100%, lasting for 1 turn.

Name: Watchmaker, Master of Dream Machinations
4-Piece Bonus: When the wearer uses their Ultimate on an ally, Break Effect for all allies increases by 30% for 2 turn(s). This effect cannot be stacked.

Name: Iron Cavalry Against the Scourge
4-Piece Bonus: If the wearer's Break Effect is 150% or higher, ignores 10% of the enemy target's DEF when dealing Break DMG to them. When the wearer's Break Effect is 250% or higher, the Super Break DMG they deal to enemy targets additionally ignores 15% of the targets' DEF.

Name: The Wind-Soaring Valorous
4-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 6%. When the wearer uses a follow-up attack, increase the DMG dealt by their Ultimate by 36%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

Name: Sacerdos' Relived Ordeal
4-Piece Bonus: When using Skill or Ultimate on one ally target, increases the ability target's CRIT DMG by 18%, lasting for 2 turn(s). This effect can stack up to 2 time(s).

Name: Scholar Lost in Erudition
4-Piece Bonus: Increases DMG dealt by Skill and Ultimate by 20%. After using Ultimate, additionally increases the DMG dealt by the next Skill by 25%.

Name: Hero of Triumphant Song
4-Piece Bonus: While the wearer's memosprite is on the field, increases the wearer's SPD by 6%. When the wearer's memosprite attacks, increases the wearer and memosprite's CRIT DMG by 30% for 2 turn(s).

Name: Poet of Mourning Collapse
4-Piece Bonus: Decreases the wearer's SPD by 8%. Before entering battle, if the wearer's SPD is less than 110/95, increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 20%/32%. This effect also applies to the wearer's memosprite.

Name: Warrior Goddess of Sun and Thunder
4-Piece Bonus: When the wearer and their memosprite provide healing to ally targets aside from themselves, the wearer gains "Gentle Rain," which can be triggered up to 1 time per turn, lasting for 2 turn(s). While the wearer has "Gentle Rain," increases their SPD by 6% and all allies' CRIT DMG by 15%. This effect cannot be stacked.

Name: Wavestrider Captain
4-Piece Bonus: When the wearer becomes the target of another ally target's ability, gains 1 stack of "Help," stacking up to 2 time(s). If there are 2 stack(s) of "Help" when the wearer uses their Ultimate, consumes all "Help" to increase the wearer's ATK by 48% for 1 turn(s).

Name: Space Sealing Station
2-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, the wearer's ATK increases by an extra 12%.

Name: Fleet of the Ageless
2-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 12%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, all allies' ATK increases by 8%.

Name: Pan-Cosmic Commercial Enterprise
2-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's Effect Hit Rate by 10%. Meanwhile, the wearer's ATK increases by an amount that is equal to 25% of the current Effect Hit Rate, up to a maximum of 25%.

Name: Belobog of the Architects
2-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's DEF by 15%. When the wearer's Effect Hit Rate is 50% or higher, the wearer gains an extra 15% DEF.

Name: Celestial Differentiator
2-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 16%. When the wearer's current CRIT DMG reaches 120% or higher, after entering battle, the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 60% until the end of their first attack.

Name: Inert Salsotto
2-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 50% or higher, the wearer's Ultimate and follow-up attack DMG increases by 15%.

Name: Talia: Kingdom of Banditry
2-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's Break Effect by 16%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 145 or higher, the wearer's Break effect increases by an extra 20%.

Name: Sprightly Vonwacq
2-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. When the wearer's SPD reaches 120 or higher, the wearer's action is Advanced Forward by 40% immediately upon entering battle.

Name: Rutilant Arena
2-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 8%. When the wearer's current CRIT Rate reaches 70% or higher, the wearer's Basic ATK and Skill DMG increase by 20%.

Name: Broken Keel
2-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's Effect RES by 10%. When the wearer's Effect RES is at 30% or higher, all allies' CRIT DMG increases by 10%.

Name: Firmament Frontline: Glamoth
2-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's SPD is equal to or higher than 135/160, the wearer deals 12%/18% more DMG.

Name: Penacony, Land of the Dreams
2-Piece Bonus: Increases wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. Increases DMG for all other allies with the same DMG Type as the wearer by 10%.

Name: Sigonia, the Unclaimed Desolation
2-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's CRIT Rate by 4%. When an enemy target gets defeated, the wearer's CRIT DMG increases by 4%, stacking up to 10 time(s).

Name: Izumo Gensei and Takama Divine Realm
2-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When entering battle, if at least one other ally follows the same Path as the wearer, then the wearer's CRIT Rate increases by 12%.

Name: Duran, Dynasty of Running Wolves
2-Piece Bonus: When allies use follow-up attacks, the wearer receives 1 stack of Merit, stacking up to 5 times. Every stack of Merit increases the DMG dealt by the wearer's follow-up attacks by 5%. When there are 5 stacks, additionally increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 25%.

Name: Forge of the Kalpagni Lantern
2-Piece Bonus: Increase the wearer's SPD by 6%. When the wearer hits enemy targets with Fire Weakness, the wearer's Break Effect increases by 40%, lasting for 1 turn(s).

Name: Lushaka, the Sunken Seas
2-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's Energy Regeneration Rate by 5%. If the wearer is not the first character in the team lineup, then increase the ATK of the first character in the team lineup by 12%.

Name: The Wondrous BananAmusement Park
2-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's CRIT DMG by 16%. When a target summoned by the wearer is on the field, CRIT DMG additionally increases by 32%.

Name: Bone Collection's Serene Demesne
2-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's Max HP by 12%. When the wearer's Max HP is 5000 or higher, increases the wearer's and their memosprite's CRIT DMG by 28%.

Name: Giant Tree of Rapt Brooding
2-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's SPD by 6%. When the wearer's SPD is 135/180 or higher, the wearer and their memosprite's Outgoing Healing increases by 12%/20%.

Name: Arcadia of Woven Dreams
2-Piece Bonus: When there are currently more or less than 4 ally targets in battle, each additional/missing ally target increases the wearer and their memosprite's DMG by 9%/12%, up to a maximum of 4/3 stacks.

Name: Revelry by the Sea
2-Piece Bonus: Increases the wearer's ATK by 12%. When the wearer's ATK is higher than or equal to 2400/3600, increases the DoT DMG dealt by 12%/24%.
